name: argo2id-wasm
description: This project demonstrates how to use a WebAssembly (WASM) module to generate Argon2id hashes within a Cloudflare Workers environment. It showcases the integration of a Rust-compiled WASM module into a Cloudflare Worker, enabling high-performance password hashing functionality.
author: aazf

scripts.wasm: cd wasm && wasm-pack build --release && cp patch.js pkg/argon2id_wasm.js
